Articles.Content:
Another of my "whatever would I use that for?" rockets:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oNtamSNHpWk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Craft file: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/vkb21m1il2xu4mw/Fast%20to%20orbit%204.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/vkb21m1il2xu4mw/Fast%20to%20orbit%204.craft?dl=0)

What it does is stage empty stages without staging. 

Err, yea, I'm not sure quite what it's for either. Maybe an SSTO challenge? 

Basically, action group 1 fires the engines. When the bottom tank is empty you press 2 and the boosters fire and overheat the tank and destroy it. Same for the next tank with pressing 3 when it's empty.

I'll leave that one with you.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-23T20:27:33Z" title="05/23/2015 08:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 23, 2015</time> by Foxster**
Trying to find loopholes in making SSTOs be like xD
